hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 7

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 1

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Eyeball Frog#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Flame Maze Left Side Pot 4

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LW (Bridge).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Saria's House#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #5# major items.
